Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Fire = Tool:WaitForChild("Fire") Reload = Tool:WaitForChild("Reload")
EquipSound = Handle:WaitForChild("Equip") ReloadSound = Handle:WaitForChild("Reload") SwooshSound = Handle:WaitForChild("Swoosh")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
BoxingGlovePart = Instance.new("Part") BoxingGlovePart.Name = "BoxingGlove" BoxingGlovePart.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic BoxingGlovePart.Shape = Enum.PartType.Block BoxingGlovePart.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth BoxingGlovePart.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth BoxingGlovePart.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom BoxingGlovePart.Size = Vector3.new(0.75, 1, 1) BoxingGlovePart.CanCollide = false local Mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") Mesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=166886053" Mesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=166886089" Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) Mesh.Parent = BoxingGlovePart
Damage = 20
Active = false BoxingGlove = Handle:FindFirstChild("BoxingGlove") Loaded = ((BoxingGlove and true) or false)
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function CreateBoxingGlove() BoxingGlove = Handle:FindFirstChild("BoxingGlove") if BoxingGlove then BoxingGlove:Destroy() end BoxingGlove = BoxingGlovePart:Clone() BoxingGloveWeld = Instance.new("Weld") BoxingGloveWeld.Name = "BoxingGloveWeld" BoxingGloveWeld.Part0 = Handle BoxingGloveWeld.Part1 = BoxingGlove BoxingGloveWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(0.075, -0.3, 2.3) BoxingGloveWeld.Parent = BoxingGlove BoxingGlove.Parent = Handle end
function GetTotalMass(Parent) local Mass = 0 local function GetMass(Parent) for i, v in pairs(Parent:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("BasePart") then Mass = (Mass + v:GetMass()) end GetMass(v) end end GetMass(Parent) return Mass end
function Activated() if not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 or Active then return end Tool.Enabled = false Active = true if Loaded then Loaded = false local BoxingGloveProjectile = BoxingGlovePart:Clone() BoxingGloveProjectile.CanCollide = true local BoxingGloveCFrame = BoxingGlove.CFrame if BoxingGlove and BoxingGlove.Parent then BoxingGlove:Destroy() end BoxingGloveProjectile.CFrame = BoxingGloveCFrame local Mass = BoxingGloveProjectile:GetMass() local TargetPoint = Humanoid.TargetPoint local Direction = CFrame.new(BoxingGloveProjectile.Position, Humanoid.TargetPoint) local BodyVelocity = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") BodyVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new((Mass * 196.2), (Mass * 196.2), (Mass * 196.2)) BodyVelocity.velocity = CFrame.new(BoxingGloveProjectile.Position, TargetPoint).lookVector * 50 BodyVelocity.Parent = BoxingGloveProjectile local BodyGyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") BodyGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new((Mass * 196.2), (Mass * 196.2), (Mass * 196.2)) BodyGyro.cframe = Direction BodyGyro.Parent = BoxingGloveProjectile local Debounce = false BoxingGloveProjectile.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if Hit and Hit.Parent and Hit.Parent ~= Character and not Debounce then local humanoid = Hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 then Debounce = true UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) humanoid:TakeDamage(Damage) local Weld = Instance.new("Weld") Weld.Part0 = BoxingGloveProjectile Weld.Part1 = Hit Weld.C0 = BoxingGloveProjectile.CFrame:inverse() Weld.C1 = Hit.CFrame:inverse() Weld.Parent = BoxingGloveProjectile if BodyVelocity and BodyVelocity.Parent then BodyVelocity:Destroy() end if BodyGyro and BodyGyro.Parent then BodyGyro:Destroy() end local torso = Hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") if torso then local Mass = GetTotalMass(Character) local BodyVelocity = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") BodyVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new((Mass * 196.2 * 2), (Mass * 196.2 * 2), (Mass * 196.2 * 2)) BodyVelocity.velocity = BoxingGloveProjectile.CFrame.lookVector * 50 Debris:AddItem(BodyVelocity, 5) local BoxingGloveChanged Spawn(function() while BodyVelocity and BodyVelocity.Parent do torso.Velocity = BoxingGloveProjectile.CFrame.lookVector * 50 wait(0.1) end end) BoxingGloveChanged = Weld.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Parent" and not BoxingGloveProjectile.Parent then if BodyVelocity and BodyVelocity.Parent then BodyVelocity:Destroy() BoxingGloveChanged:disconnect() end end end) Delay(5, function() if BoxingGloveChanged then BoxingGloveChanged:disconnect() end end) BodyVelocity.Parent = torso end end end end) Debris:AddItem(BoxingGloveProjectile, 5) BoxingGloveProjectile.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") BoxingGloveProjectile.CFrame = Direction FireAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Fire) if FireAnim then FireAnim:Play(nil, nil, 0.75) end wait(2.125) if FireAnim then FireAnim:Stop() end else local LeftArm = Character:FindFirstChild("Left Arm") if LeftArm then ReloadBoxingGlove = BoxingGlovePart:Clone() ReloadBoxingGloveWeld = Instance.new("Weld") ReloadBoxingGloveWeld.Part0 = LeftArm ReloadBoxingGloveWeld.Part1 = ReloadBoxingGlove ReloadBoxingGloveWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(0, 0, 1.525) * CFrame.Angles((math.pi / 2), 0, 0) ReloadBoxingGloveWeld.Parent = ReloadBoxingGlove Debris:AddItem(ReloadBoxingGlove, 5) ReloadBoxingGlove.Parent = Character end ReloadAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Reload) if ReloadAnim then ReloadAnim:Play(nil, nil, 0.5) end wait(1.5) if ReloadBoxingGlove and ReloadBoxingGlove.Parent then ReloadBoxingGlove:Destroy() end CreateBoxingGlove() wait(0.5) if ReloadAnim then ReloadAnim:Stop() end Loaded = true end Active = false Tool.Enabled = true end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not Player or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 then return end end
function Unequipped() for i, v in pairs({FireAnim, ReloadAnim}) do if v then v:Stop() end end end
Tool.Activated:connect(Activated) Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)
